title: Tempted by the Billionaire
description: What price will he extract for the career of her dreams? I’m Savannah.I’m a recent college grad in desperate need of a job.When Billionaire CEO Chad Force interviews me, I’m blindingly attracted to him.But he’s older. Wiser. And notorious about going after what he wants.That will never be me.Except the way he’s looking at me says it might.Just how far am I willing to go for the opportunity of a lifetime?Enjoy this Forbidden Confession. HEA guaranteed!
author: Shayla Black
